content: All users will be added to {{productName}} with the selected type.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a tooltip that explains how selecting an LDAP user type will add users to a specific product, in this case {{productName}}. It appears as a hover text or tooltip when the "LdapUserType" option is selected, providing context for end-users.

usage.context: {t("LdapUsersType")} {t("LdapUserTypeTooltip", { productName: t("Common:ProductName"), })}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'All users will be added' is better translated as 'سيتم تسجيل جميع المستخدمين' instead of 'سيتم إضافة كافة المستخدمين'. While 'إضافة' (addition) is not incorrect, 'تسجيل' (registration/enrollment) is more contextually accurate for user onboarding/integration into a system.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: سيتم تسجيل جميع المستخدمين إلى {{productName}} بالنوع المحدد.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani sentence structure could be improved for better flow. The phrase '–a' after '{{productName}}' feels awkward and doesn't quite translate the original meaning naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bütün istifadəçilər seçilmiş növlə {{productName}}’a əlavə ediləcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the use of a hyphen after '{{productName}}' is unconventional in Azerbaijani for this context. A space or a slightly different phrasing would be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bütün istifadəçilər seçilmiş növlə {{productName}} əlavə olunacaq.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ດ້ວຍ' is a bit ambiguous and might be better replaced with a more specific term relating to assignment or association.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຜູ້ໃຊ້ທັງໝົດຈະຖືກເພີ່ມເຂົ້າສູ່ {{productName}} ດ້ວຍການກຳນົດປະເພດທີ່ເລືອກໄວ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb 'adăugate' (added) doesn't agree with the plural subject 'utilizatorii' (users). It should be in the masculine plural form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Toți utilizatorii vor fi adăugați în {{productName}} cu tipul selectat.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "සියලු පරිශීලකයින් තෝරාගත් වර්ගය සමඟ {{productName}} වෙත එකතු කරනු ලැබේ." doesn't perfectly convey the meaning of the English sentence "All users will be added to {{productName}} with the selected type." A more accurate translation would emphasize that the selected type *defines* how they are added. The current phrasing implies they are simply added *alongside* the selected type.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සියලු පරිශීලකයින් තෝරාගත් වර්ගයට අනුව {{productName}} වෙත එකතු කරනු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Сви корисници ће бити додати на {{productName}} са одабраним типом.' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Serbian. A more idiomatic translation would convey the same meaning more clearly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Сви корисници биће креирани у {{productName}} са одабраним типом.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '所有用户都将使用所选类型添加到{{productName}}' literally translates to 'All users will be added to {{productName}} using the selected type.' This isn't the most natural phrasing in Chinese. It sounds a bit awkward.

The original English uses '{{productName}}' as a placeholder. The Chinese translation uses the same placeholder, ensuring consistency is maintained. However, '{{selectedType}}' should be used in the suggested correction for clarity and matching the intent of the original sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, maintaining the placeholder '{{productName}}'
